Detailed Description

template<class Ty>
struct TREX::utils::internals::attr_helper< Ty >

XML attribibute parsing helper.

Template Parameters:
Ty the expected output type

This class is used internally as an helper to extract the value of an XML attribute and parse it as a Ty instance

Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

template<class Ty >
static Ty TREX::utils::internals::attr_helper< Ty >::get ( boost::property_tree::ptree const &  pt,
std::string const &  name 
) [inline, static]

Parse attribute.

Parameters:
[in] pt A xml based property tree
[in] name An attribute name

Extracts the value of the attribute name from the property tree pt

Precondition:
The path "<xmlattr>."+name exists
The value of the attribute can be parsed as a Ty
Returns:
the value of this attribute
